author: Associated Press
title: Ex-Ambassador, Washington Gov. Says Trump Campaign ‘Fanning Hatred’ With New Ad
description: Trump’s reelection campaign released an ad that accused Joe Biden of being too cozy with China, featuring former Washington Gov. Gary Locke
content:
(WASHINGTON) — Former U.S. Ambassador to China Gary Locke is denouncing President Donald Trump for a new campaign ad that seems to falsely imply Locke was a Chinese official.
Trump’s Republican reelection campaign released an ad Thursday that accused former … [+1827 chars]
